column8: a foreigner with a Facebook account Marie Thourida Dekeister made a request for justice from authorities and officials.------The Frenchman
column9: Jean Yves Dekeister was hit by a------ white Range Rover on 29th November------ in Chbar Ampov
column10: causing him to have his left leg amputated.  The driver left the scene and has not been traced.------He has been in Cambodia since 1991
column11: where he has done volunteering work and speaks Khmer very well.------HOTNEW
